item.title: How to learn anything
item.description: How approach learning in an efficient manner. “If you wish to make an apple pie from scratch, you must first invent the universe” – Carls Sagan

item.title: Blog, learning and skin in the game
item.description: Blogging as a way to learn First let me briefly explain what I thin "learning" is. What does this have to do with skin in the game?
